title: Need help identifying this typeface...
content:
Hi, can anyone help me identify the typeface used in this logo? Specifically the one used for Garth.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo-iamgarth.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091127102734/http:/typophile.com/files/logo-iamgarth.gif) | 2.65 KB |
author: bjk

comments.content: I would be shocked if that weren’t custom drawn.
Yeah that’s kind of what I was thinking as well...
